=================================
### My Tender Announcement Entry

#### Title and Reference
* Title (English/French): **Digital Content Platform/Plateforme de contenu numérique**
* Reference Number: **PW-23-01029679**
* Amendment Number: **0**
* Solicitation Number: **24062-23-568**
* Publication Date: **March 10, 2023**
* Tender Closing Date: **March 24, 2023 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)**
* Notice Type: **Advance Contract Award Notice**
* Procurement Category: **Goods and Services**

#### Contract Details
* Country: **Canada**
* Region of Opportunity: **National Capital Region (NCR) / Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)**
* Regions of Delivery: **National Capital Region (NCR) / Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)**

#### Contracting Entity
* Contracting Entity: **Treasury Board of Canada/Conseil du Trésor du Canada**
* Address: **90 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R5**
* End-User Entity: **Treasury Board of Canada/Conseil du Trésor du Canada**

#### Contract Overview
The Financial Management Community and Development (FMCD) team seeks to enhance the skills and career growth of the Government of Canada’s finance community through recruitment initiatives, development programs, and learning and networking events. To achieve this goal, a comprehensive digital content platform is required to manage digital content and generate bilingual web profiles, websites, and reports.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
* Heather Ross, **heather.ross@tbs-sct.gc.ca**
* Phone: **613-291-3773**
* Address: **90 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R5**

#### Attachment
Please refer to the following attachment for detailed information:
* English: **https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/10/3fe55d9c44be7c6f072f4291d2c36550/tbs_acan_24062-23-568.pdf**
* French: **https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/10/0cb79a39e603dd61334eb51db0951267/sct_pac_24062
